titleStmt.title: The saints rest: or Their happy sleep in death. As it was delivered in a sermon at Aldermanbury London, Aug 24. 1651. By Edmund Calamy B.D.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with "printed by A. Miller" in imprint.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Said to be for Mr. Love"; "Septemb.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
